snippet: Daniel J. Heinrich was charged Thursday with possession of child pornography and is a person of interest in the disappearance of Jacob E. Wetterling, who was 11 when he was abducted.
abstract: Minnesota officials say they Daniel J Heinrich, who has been charged with charges related to child pornography in St Paul, is person of interest in unsolved abduction of Jacob E Wetterling, who was abducted at the age of 11 in 1989 near his home in St Joseph.
lead_paragraph: Daniel J. Heinrich was charged Thursday with possession of child pornography and is a person of interest in the disappearance of Jacob E. Wetterling, who was 11 when he was abducted.

headline.main: ‘Person of Interest’ Identified in 1989 Abduction of Jacob Wetterling
